content: not be copied resold or redistributed in any way 7 ws k1 sl1 wyif and repeat this 2 steps k2tog tbl knit together the body and the tie belt stitch turn the work repeat until all stitches from the body are done where you have to knit together the two double ends there you have to knit only 6 stitches not the 12 stitches you can k3tog instead of k2tg when you finish the body collar continue again with the tie belt with the double edge technique and knit with the same method ~ 1 meter long tail again bind off with italian bind off technique finishing wave in all ends and if you have an open armhole sew them together block the finished cardigan and enjoy your new piece of your wardrobe 🙂 lolbert-szabó júlia ©copyright 2024 instagram @lsz_juli this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way 8 lolbert-szabó júlia ©copyright 2024 instagram @lsz_juli this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way 9
